font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 叛乱分子： one who breaks with or opposes constituted authority or the established order
【例】 Insurgents armed with assault rifles and grenades ambushed a US convoy, resulting in heavy casualties.持有突击步枪和手榴弹的叛乱分子偷袭了美军车队，造成重大伤亡
【近】 rebel, anarchist, antagonist, malcontent, mutineer
【派】 insurgency n. 叛乱

【记】 in进 + surge 巨浪，巨浪冲进来了→叛乱
【另】 resurgent 复活，复兴
